oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Postcard, Scene at Fourth Ward, 1907
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: James E. Thompson, Photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Unused postcard. "Scene at Fourth Ward. This ward gave a dry majority of 46." Shows crowd with signs waiting for election returns. JET logo (James E. Thomson, Photographer) at lower left. #14 at lower right. [Knoxville's Great Temperance Election of March 11, 1907.]
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Postcards; Voting; Temperance; Women's suffrage;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use material or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814. Please provide a brief description of the material.
